Title: Can You Help?
Plot: Today, Joe needs our help. That's not unusual, but it happens to be the particular theme for this episode. We help out Joe, Blue and the other characters in a number of ways. For example, we help Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper to make some blueberry pancakes for Blue. We also help out some friends in Storybook Forest to prepare for a porridge party.
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
GuestStars: Jazmyn Boone, Marcus Beckett, Nicole Block, Janet Nichelle Bolden, Sydney Casamassima, Tracey Casamassima, Jalyn Dewer, Lorraine Flores, Alex Nahon, Alexander Rue, Jake Syzmanski, Kennedy Taylor, Samuel Williams
